text: Sodium manganate is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is Na2MnO4. It contains sodium and manganate ions. It is a bright green solid at 25 degrees Celsius at standard atmosphere (a pressure). It cannot be made by reacting manganese dioxide with sodium hydroxide, like potassium manganate is made. It is made by reacting hot sodium hydroxide with sodium permanganate. This releases oxygen and makes sodium manganate. It is more expensive than potassium manganate because it is harder to make. ==Related pages== *Manganese(II) oxide *Manganese(VII) oxide *Potassium permanganate Category:Sodium compounds Category:Manganates
title: Sodium manganate
